column5: Whos laughing now.HAHAHAHAHA  Say hello to the newest addition to the Blowes family.The name continues on.  Mike   Have fun with the grand kids Rob.  Congrats
Rob you old man congrats and brother B your turn is coming
Rob looks too young to be a Granfather  Congrats again I guess its your use of the oil of olay
Thanks guys that is my oldest sons baby 8lbs 13oz now i have two grand children can't wait till Xmas this year  Rob
Yer still drunk arent ya?LOL  The best is yet to come. Wait til thier crawl,n around and grabbing this and that. And your saying, NOOOOOOOOOOOO dont touch that. HAHAHAHAHA
Congrats Rob!  At least now you can spoil them and send them away.......LOL.  He's a good sized lad too!  Sinker
Ahhh yes, grandchildren....a parents best revenge   Congrats Rob, and to your son and daughter in law....  Now go get that fishing rod  Maureen
Congratulations Rob  A real cutie and bundle of joy Jacques
thanks rob that makes me a greatgrandfather one more time . By the way brian you are a great uncle thats old too lol lol I think I need a bigger boat lol
The look on that wee one's face says " gimme a bottle quick"  Another child to cherish and spoil.
Never thought of that pop. I,ll give ya 1,000,000 pennies for your new boat?
Congrats Rob, and Brian  good looking baby,   are you sure the genes match?
